name: So Many Sharks!
description:
This is a small game made for 1st Patras Game Jam! The theme was "So many sharks", so this game has that many sharks! The goal is to pass through 10 treasure chaches and hit "F" in 4 stone "puzzles" in order to activate the VICTORY condition. Beware the dangerous sharks and Nazi-zombie-were-sharks that hunt you to reduce your red health bar to 0!

Good luck!
